page.title: 11Farms
page.content: Farms are very busy and also dangerous places because the tractors and other machinery can tip up and kill the driver. Most farms grow crops to feed the animals. When we surveyed the land we found from the 13 farms in our block, we had most fields of grass, and we also noticed very little oats grown in North Yorkshire because the soil and weather do not produce a good harvest. Oil Seed Rape has doubled in prodution between the 1983 census and this year. There are two types of rape: 1.Oil Seed-oil is extracted and used for cooking oil, cosmetics and soap. 2.Fodder _ not used for oil but for animal feed.
